store

Class Store

  • java.lang.Object
    • store.Store

  • public class Store
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for the store. The store's name and starting capital must be set in the source code. author: alfhj

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Manifest exportManifest()
      Uses ManifestGenerator to generate a manifest based on the store's current inventory.
      double getCapital()
      Returns the store's current capital in dollars.
      static Store getInstance()
      Returns the instance of the store by the singleton pattern
      Stock getInventory()
      Returns the store's current inventory.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the store's name
      void importManifest(Manifest manifest)
      Imports a manifest into the store.
      void importSalesLog(Stock sold)
      Imports a sales log in a Stock format.
      void loadInventory(Stock stock)
      Initialises the store's inventory to the specified Stock.
      void reset()
      Resets the capital and inventory to their default values.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Store getInstance()
        Returns the instance of the store by the singleton pattern
        Returns:
        the instance of the store

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the capital and inventory to their default values. Used for unit testing purposes.

      • loadInventory

        public void loadInventory(Stock stock)
                   throws StockException
        Initialises the store's inventory to the specified Stock. The amounts in the stock is ignored and set to zero.
        Parameters:
        stock - the initial stock
        Throws:
        StockException - via Stock

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the store's name
        Returns:
        name

      • getCapital

        public double getCapital()
        Returns the store's current capital in dollars.
        Returns:
        current capital

      • getInventory

        public Stock getInventory()
        Returns the store's current inventory.
        Returns:
        current inventory

      • exportManifest

        public Manifest exportManifest()
                        throws StockException,
                               DeliveryException,
                               StoreException
        Uses ManifestGenerator to generate a manifest based on the store's current inventory.
        Returns:
        the generated manifest
        Throws:
        StockException - via ManifestGenerator
        DeliveryException - via ManifestGenerator
        StoreException - via ManifestGenerator

      • importManifest

        public void importManifest(Manifest manifest)
                    throws StockException,
                           StoreException
        Imports a manifest into the store. This is imported when the store receives a delivery from a distribution centre. Results in increased stock and reduced capital.
        Parameters:
        manifest - the manifest to import
        Throws:
        StockException - via Stock
        StoreException - if manifest is empty
        StoreException - if manifest contains item not found in store's inventory

      • importSalesLog

        public void importSalesLog(Stock sold)
                    throws StoreException
        Imports a sales log in a Stock format. This is imported at the end of each week. Results in decreased inventory and increased capital.
        Parameters:
        sold - the total Stock of sold items
        Throws:
        StoreException - if an item's amount goes below 0.
